snippet: Gustav Nyquist broke a tie with seven minutes left in the third period, and the host Detroit Red Wings held on to beat the Boston Bruins, 3-2.
lead_paragraph: Gustav Nyquist broke a tie with seven minutes left in the third period, and the host Detroit Red Wings held on to beat the Boston Bruins, 3-2.

headline.main: Red Wings Stop Bruins’ Road Streak
headline.print_headline: Red Wings Stop Bruins’ Road Streak
